ComicInfo.Summary:
The Doomsdale Scenario Part 3: Savage infiltrates Doomsdale Nuclear Research Station and destroys the core with a handily placed lorry of acid.
Flesh Book 1 Part 15: Chaos ensues as day seven, "the day of the dinosaurs' revenge", bodes poorly for the entrapped humans.
Harlem Heroes Part 15: Zach Harper earns a "death-date" with 'Red' Macardle to decide the victor of a tied aeroball game.
Hollow World Part 4: The Titan I.C. skids to a stop, only to find that this strange planet is The Mekon's secret hideout!
Yeti: Investigating tales of an "invisible death", Probe discovers the Lama's opium ring... and his yetis!
Robot Wars, Part 6: Judge Dredd succeeds in reprogramming the robotics factory, but not before Call-Me-Kenneth marches to the Grand Hall of Justice.
